name: Llama Trauma (GQ)
description:
Here is our submission to the Congressional App Challenge: Llama Trauma! In this game, you play as a scarecrow who is just trying to farm some corn, but llamas keep interrupting! This game is to help inspire people to help at, or donate to, their local food bank.

Developed by:

Connor Anderson, Taran Zorn, Brianna Simpson, and Griffin Gaskins
